document_data.name: Kirin
document_data.mainbody:
The '''kirin''' was a type of [[tree]] that grew on the eastern side of the [[Thunder Peaks|Thunder Peak Mountains]] in [[Cormyr]].

The herb known as ''kirin's leaf'' was derived from these trees. When they were ground up and mixed with certain reagents, it would produce a solution that was bottled and turned into a [[potion]] that reversed the emotions of the drinker.
